name: Halloween Mission
description:
WELCOME HERE!

This is a game I made for halloween, or bassically to let you know that i'm alive.

HOW SHOULD I PLAY?

You're in a hunted village, knocking doors to get more candies. Fill the cauldron to save the village from ghosts, which  become more and more over time. Protect yourself with a candy gun that shoots candies you collect. Don't spent a lots of candies, try to avoid ghosts somethimes. They just can't see you , when you hiding behind obstacles. Don't forget about spooky vibes, play it, if you're sure.

Just keep in you head that main goal is to fill the cauldron with 200 candies.

After that you have to fight the boss.

IS IT BORING?

Yeah! I mean, kinda... I spent 30 minutes in it to won. Pretty worth to kill the time FOR HALLOWEEN!

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look around

T -  Candy Gun

LMB - Interact (Knocking doors, use gun, fill cauldron, etc.)

Space Bar - Jump

Shift - Run

HOLD LMB - Shoot Candy Gun

CTRL - Crouch

ESC - Pause

Alright, afterwords now.

I made this game for halloween, problably will not update it tho.

Have fun. Follow other news. Have a spooky halloween...
